comment: THE BEST PROFESSOR AT KENNESAW. You will not find another professor who cares about her students and genuinely wants to see hers students succeed. Loves the subject she teaches and is very passionate. Take her if you want to be inspired and learn about Business law. She's amazing!!

Took her class online. We had 4 exams. There were weekly smartbooks and quizzes that were super easy to complete. The exam is lockdown browser but is OPEN BOOK, OPEN NOTE. It's easy to find everything. She also had extra credit assignments on Connect. The grading was split evenly between smartbooks, quizzes, and exams so exams won't hurt as much!

Tests are online lockdown browser with webcam but lets you use your notes and the book. USE THE SEARCH TOOL IN THE BOOK ON ANOTHER COMPUTER! Quizzes aren't lockdown or anything just on D2L. Do all of the learnsmarts and extra credit quizzes at the end. Can be hard sometimes because theres so much material but overall pretty easy. Great professor!

The class is straight forward. Everything is done online so that you do not have to go to class. The most difficult part of the class was the tests. Short time limits and the use of lockdown browser were implemented.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: Course is not bad at all, 3 tests and a final on lockdown/webcam but open note/book. Learnsmart heavy but you can literally only get a 100 on them if you do them, quiz heavy (online not lockdown) but not hard just look at your book and other resources. Only technically have to be present in class for your "expert chapter". Shes funny and caring!

She is 0% caring and 0% understanding that students have lives outside of her class. If you think anything will come up in your life during the semester, don't take her bc she'll fail you. Tests are lockdown w camera but open book/note, heavy connect assignments, and you have to be an "expert" on an assigned chapter that's worth as much as a test.

I loved having Professor Toson. She loves teaching the material and makes it extremely interesting. Weekly smart book learn smarts and chapter quizzes make you really learn the material and are really effective in helping you understand it, which translates well to her online (lockdown) tests. Without a doubt take her

I loved this class and thought Professor Toson was amazing. She posted lectures every week that summarized the main points of chapters that you should then read in the textbook. Grading was clear- quizzes and discussions every week, 3 exams throughout the semester, and a final. Professor Toson was also very quick to respond to any questions I had.

This prof was amazing! I never went to any classes and still made an A+! There are easy online hw and easy online quizzes all answers are online! The test are online and lockdown broswer but theres no webcam so just have another laptop on the side! You only have to go to class once for a expert testimony but its easy and she grades rlly easy/fair.

Professor Toson is the bomb. If a spot is open in her class, take it. Homework and a quiz every week, but its easy stuff. She assigns a chapter for you to learn and asks you questions about it in class. Tests are easy because the way she teaches the material helps you actually learn it. She's super funny, too.
She's so amazing! I loved taking her class because she was easy to follow and very responsive to any questions or concerns. I'd love to take any classes she teaches.

I took Professor Toson's BLAW2200 course online. This class had a very regular schedule of assignments and expectations were clear. She grades very fairly. I would definitely take another course that Professor Toson teaches.

Weekly discussion, grading criteria was not super clear. Weekly quizzes, answers on quizlet. The Learn Smart program was a total pain, and it is mandatory, and expensive. She typically responds fast. Overall, an interesting course
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Would take again

comment: BLAW is really boring but she makes it somewhat entertaining. You only need to go to class once for your expert testimony, where you can be randomly called upon to answer questions. Tests and quizzes are online but tests require Lockdown Browser. Tests are not easy and have lots of trick q's but if you do fine on everything else you'll make an A

Dr. Toson wants her students to learn, but she is a tough grader on the group projects that you do. There are 5 total, which all include a paper each. She assigns groups to you, which fortuntately for me, I was in probably one of the best groups in the class. I would recommend that you email your papers to her in advance to get good feedback.

Professor Toson is a great lecturer even though there is no attendance policy. Tests are all online and only have one Subject Expert Testimony which requires you and a group of randomly assigned people to be an "expert" on a chapter she assigns to answer questions during her lectures. Super easy. Took her M/W/F but she told us not to come Fridays.

SHE IS GREAT!!! Best teacher I have ever had in college and makes the hard stuff seem easy and explains the class material extremely well. All the test and quizzes were online. We also had one expert testimony which was a breeze just be prepared for that. But that is all. JUST SIGN UP FOR HER CLASS!!!!!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--CARES ABOUT STUDENTS--Respected by students

comment: SHE IS JUST AMAZING!!! Best teacher ever her material was interesting and made the class fun and had great material. The best teacher, I have ever had. The test were all online and so were the quizzes and they were great you could do it at your own time . She is great just take her!!

If you come to her lectures, you should be prepared for her tests and quizzes.  Entertaining lecturer.  You will need the book and will need to read before class.  Sometimes gives some questions on tests that try to trick you, but overall I enjoyed her class.
All Tests & quizzes online along with powerpoints. I stopped showing up after I gave my expert testimony (chapter review, mandatory) & got an A. She's nice

Good teacher but not understanding of post military obligations. I showed up late for class on my expert testimony day due to an urgent VA appt that took longer than expected. She was not understanding and gave me a zero for participation after excusing another person from the assignment. Thank you Professor Toson for your lack of military support!

Professor Toson was one of my favorite Professors at KSU. For any freshman entering the business school i would recommend taking her. At some point you will think you dont need to show up to class and participate. It will benefit you though if you show up the entire semester.
Take her class. She is very helpful and lively in class. Good person. Tests and quizes are online along with power points. An hour timer + on quizes and tests. Yeah
Easy class. Tests and quizzes are online. Power points are online. Nice lady. Will explain anything you have questions on. Will Take again!
This professor is awful and I would NEVER take her again!! Beware you will get a terrible teacher who doesn't care for the students!
Not only is she nice to look at but she is very understanding and cares about you learning the material.

This professor is very helpful and willing to assist you in anyway possible. The work isn't that hard just knowledgable and you do learn. YOU earn your grade in this class. I have taken her for numerous of classes and will take her at anytime she fits into my major or minor. I highly recommend her:-))))
I have taken Prof Toson for numerous classes. She is always very thorough, clear and easy going. You will learn the material and she's always available to assist with any problem.

I have taken Prof Toson for numerous classes. She is always very thorough, clear and easy going. You will learn the material and she's always available to assist with any problem. I would def suggest her!
Very good professor.  Tests will take forever but they are take home.  Would reccomend her.
